alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 7:07PM CDT until September 09 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CIMARRON COUNTY... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Boise City, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 705 PM CDT, emergency management reported quarter size hail 13 miles north northwest of Boise City. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Boise City. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
